title: New: Seoul – Stay With Us
content:
Montreal trio Seoul have been racing up the Hype Machine lately with their debut track Stay With Us.

A dreamy, intoxicating number, it’s not hard to see what it’s currently racking up thousands of plays, and deservedly so. Whilst there appears to be a sudden flurry of very current sounding artists emerging, it’ll be mightily interesting to witness which can provide a form of sustainability. Check out Stay With Us below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
